description: As a User I want to crate orders with the available compartments
name: Verify that the compartments are available when Minimum requirements are met

elements.name: Verify that 4-seat compartments is only available when a Minimum of 2 persons are in cart

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 20000ms: Expected to find element: `.chakra-input`, but never found it.
    at Context.eval (src/integration/common/reservations2.js:18:5)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/resolveStepDefinition.js:193:0)
    at Context.eval (node_modules/cypress-cucumber-preprocessor/lib/createTestFromScenario.js:27:0)

steps.name: I attempt to create an order selecting '2' adult for when choosing who
The '4-seat compartment' compartments are displayed in the select reservation modal
I attempt to create an order selecting '1' adult for when choosing who
The '4-seat compartment' compartments are not displayed in the select reservation modal
